data.eml:eml: Castianeira furva sp. nov. (Araneae, Corinnidae, Castianeirinae), a new polymorphic ground sac spider from the southern Western Ghats of India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sankaran, Pradeep M., Malamel, Jobi J., Joseph, Mathew M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2015): Castianeira furva sp. nov. (Araneae, Corinnidae, Castianeirinae), a new polymorphic ground sac spider from the southern Western Ghats of India. Zootaxa 3964 (5): 569-576, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3964.5.7
